translation.en: Harper, just please get your shoes on. Please.
translation.de: Harper, bitte zieh deine Schuhe an. -Bitte. -Ich will nicht.

translation.en: I don't want to.
Come on.
Hey, do you know what we're doing today?
translation.de: Weißt du, was wir heute machen?

translation.en: We're going on an adventure together.
We're going to get on a boat. We're gonna sail across the sea to a place
translation.de: Wir segeln mit einem Boot übers Meer zu einem Ort,

translation.en: where it's always sunny and you can eat ice cream every day.
translation.de: an dem es immer sonnig ist, und man jeden Tag Eis essen kann.

translation.en: Would you like that?
Good. The only thing is,
we need to leave now. Okay?
Do you know why?
No.
[whispers] Because there's a dragon out there.
translation.de: Weil da draußen ein Drache ist.

translation.en: And if we make any noise, or if we're too slow, the dragon will eat us. Okay?
translation.de: Sind wir laut oder zu langsam, frisst er uns. Ok?

translation.en: So are you going to put your shoes on for me?
[woman] You okay?
Okay, Harper. I think you just have to walk. Is that all right?
translation.de: Ok, Harper. Du musst selbst laufen. Ist das ok?

translation.en: [man] All right, there you go.
Yeah, over there.
Here's the money.
Which boat?
-[man] It's the blue fishing trawler. -[woman] Right.
[man] Right, young lady. In you go.
There you go.
Harper's been practicing this song all week.
translation.de: Harper übt schon die ganze Woche.

translation.en: It's been driving me and Jordi mad.
translation.de: Es macht mich und Jordi verrückt.

translation.en: Off you go.
There was a woman in Germany who got a song stuck in her head for four years.
translation.de: Eine Deutsche hatte vier Jahre lang ein Lied im Kopf.

translation.en: She ended up being hospitalized.
That can't be real.
-Actually, I think maybe it was hiccups. -It's an urban myth.
translation.de: Oder war es Schluckauf? Das ist eine urbane Legende.

translation.en: Well, you're the teacher.
Supply teacher, so…
Well, only until the big interview on Tuesday.
translation.de: Bis zum großen Gespräch am Dienstag.

translation.en: I just hope you remember us little people when you're swanning about the staff room.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, du erinnerst dich im Lehrerzimmer noch an uns.

translation.en: Oh, of course I will, uh…
Olivia? School secretary?
Very funny.
Thank you.
[Olivia] She's enjoying it, though.
Yeah. It's good. I think she's finally starting to fit in here.
translation.de: Ja. Das ist gut. Sie lebt sich endlich ein.

translation.en: I'm very happy we ended up in Barcelona.
translation.de: Gut, dass wir in Barcelona gelandet sind.

translation.en: Plus, she gets to be a planet.
translation.de: Außerdem darf sie ein Planet sein.

translation.en: Well, she's… she's Pluto, isn't she?
Yeah, but it still counts.
Yeah.
-[grunts] -What did you say?
-Hey! Hey! -[boy] Stop!
-Hey! Enough! -[Harper] You're so annoying!
Hey! Hey! Break it up!
-You fucking fucker-- -Stop!
[girl] What are you doing?
[woman] Harper, enough.
So are you going to tell me?
I mean, there's got to be a reason.
Getting kicked out of the musical.
translation.de: aus dem Musical hinausgeworfen zu werden.

translation.en: It's just, you seemed pretty vocal before.
translation.de: Vorhin hattest du noch viel zu sagen.

translation.en: F this, F that.
I've got to go to the toilet.
SUPERMARKET
[woman in Catalan] The supermarket will close in two minutes.
translation.de: Der Supermarkt schließt in zehn Minuten.

translation.en: Don't miss our special three for two offer in frozen foods.
translation.de: Verpassen Sie nicht unser 3-für-2-Angebot für Tiefkühlkost.

translation.en: So, you know, we're closing soon to do inventory.
[in English] Oh, sorry my Catalan is very bad. Sorry.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, mein Katalanisch ist schlecht.

translation.en: We close in five minutes.
Okay, thank you.
Harper, say thank you.
FYI, when you throw a punch, you need to keep your fist tight.
translation.de: Bei einem Schlag muss deine Faust fest sein.

translation.en: It's basic physics.
Dissipates the force of impact.
Otherwise, you'll damage your knuckles and wrists.
Of course, all of this is irrelevant
'cause you're never going to hit anyone again, are you?
translation.de: da du nie wieder jemanden schlagen wirst, oder?

translation.en: He asked where my white stick was.
Said I needed to stay at the back of the stage 'cause…
translation.de: Sagte, ich müsse hinten bleiben, weil…

translation.en: Antonio is a little S-H-I-T.
A shit.
You're not meant to say the word. That's the point of spelling it out.
translation.de: Du sollst das nicht sagen. Deshalb buchstabierte ich es.

translation.en: You will apologize, okay?
We don't solve our problems with violence.
translation.de: Wir lösen Probleme nicht mit Gewalt.

translation.en: Are you going to tell Jordi?
[sighs] Don't know. We'll see.
You can call him Dad, you know.
Mmm, I know, I just like the name Jordi.
Yeah, but I still think he prefers for you to call him Dad.
translation.de: Ich glaube, Dad wäre ihm lieber.

translation.en: [woman] I thought I told you, eyes on the ground! Shut the fuck up!
translation.de: Ich sagte: "Schau nach unten!" Halt die Klappe!

translation.en: [whispers] Stay quiet. Stay quiet. Quick.
-Sh! Sh! -What?
[whispers] Down.
[man in Spanish] Move!
I said move!
I told you to keep moving.
-Keep moving! -No, please!
[in English] Are you okay?
[Harper] Mum!
It's you.
Ambulance! Someone, call an ambulance!
[in Spanish] Sorry.
-[Erin] Jordi! -Hey!
[Erin in English] We're okay.
[woman in Catalan] Nurse Garcia, please contact Urology.
translation.de: Schwester Garcia, bitte kontaktieren Sie die Urologie.

translation.en: -[in English] Are you okay? -[Erin] It's okay.
translation.de: -Alles ok? -Ja. -Sie sagten… -Das ist nicht mein Blut.

translation.en: It's not my blood.
-It's okay. -Okay.
Okay, let's get you to a room. Yeah?
translation.de: Bringen wir dich in ein Zimmer. Ja?

translation.en: You're okay…
[doctor] Okay…
Bruised ribs, hip contusion, minor concussions.
I'll prescribe some painkillers, okay?
Okay.
[doctor] All things considered, it could have been worse.
You and Harper are good to go.
Thank you.
[woman in Catalan] We remind you smoking is not permitted in this hospital.
translation.de: Das Rauchen ist in diesem Krankenhaus verboten.

translation.en: Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas.
translation.de: Das Rauchen ist in ausgewiesenen Bereichen erlaubt.

translation.en: [in English] So? [Erin] I'm all right. Just a bit of bruising.
Are you okay?
What happened was pretty scary. It's okay not to be okay.
translation.de: Das war beängstigend. Es ist ok, wenn es dir nicht gut geht.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Hey, I spotted a machine down the hall.
Why don't you get yourself a snack and a fizzy drink?
translation.de: Hol dir einen Snack und eine Limo.

translation.en: You said I'm not allowed any snacks or fizzy drinks after six o'clock.
translation.de: Ab 18 Uhr darf ich das doch nicht mehr.

translation.en: -I think we can make an exception. -Yeah.
Here you go.
[woman in Catalan] Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas,
translation.de: Das Rauchen ist in ausgewiesenen Bereichen erlaubt,

translation.en: at the canteen exit, and at the Emergency entrances.
translation.de: am Ausgang der Kantine und an den Notausgängen.

translation.en: [in English] As a nurse, they train you to act calm and professional.
translation.de: Als Pfleger lernt man, ruhig und professionell zu wirken.

translation.en: It's actually quite reassuring.
Ah, good, 'cause inside I'm completely freaking out.
translation.de: Gut. Innerlich flippe ich komplett aus.

translation.en: I'm so glad you're safe.
translation.de: Zum Glück ist euch nichts passiert.

translation.en: What happened to the guy?
Uh, he's out of surgery.
-Okay. -Yeah, he's in ICU.
He lost a lot of blood, though, so he might not make it through the night.
translation.de: Er hat viel Blut verloren. Vielleicht übersteht er die Nacht nicht.

translation.en: Can I see him?
Erin, this is not your fault.
At all.
But let me see what I can do.
translation.de: Mal sehen, was ich tun kann.

translation.en: We can't stay long, okay?
Shit. I… I forgot to tell Harper where we were going.
translation.de: Mist. Harper weiß nicht, wo wir sind.

translation.en: I'll be a minute.
Okay.
You.
It's you, Kate. It's really you.
translation.de: Du bist es, Kate. Du bist es wirklich.

translation.en: I don't know you. We've never met.
translation.de: Ich kenne Sie nicht. Bin Ihnen nie begegnet.

translation.en: Liar.
Liar!
Liar.
[man in Spanish] Let's go!
[man in Catalan] Emergency. All available doctors report to room 124.
translation.de: Notfall. Alle verfügbaren Ärzte zu Zimmer 124. Hier. Setz dich.

translation.en: [in English] Sit here.
Wait here. Okay?
[woman in Spanish] He's in V-fib.
[in English] You have to go.
[woman in Spanish] Okay.
-[paddles whirring] -Clear. Clear.
[in English] It's okay, baby.
[Jordi] You sure you're okay?
Yeah.
Well…
No.
It's like Harper said. It's 50/50.
translation.de: Wie Harper sagte. Es ist fifty-fifty.

translation.en: Well, you know, they have people at the hospital, uh, counselors.
Specialists who deal with post-traumatic situations.
Yeah.
Oh. What are you doing?
I'm distracting you.
[Jordi] That's not… going to work.
It's going to work.
Okay. It is going to work. But I still think that we should talk
translation.de: Ok. Es wird funktionieren. Aber wir sollten darüber reden, was passiert ist.

translation.en: about what happened.
translation.de: Aber wir sollten darüber reden, was passiert ist.

translation.en: That's why I'm trying to distract you.
-[Harper] Hey there. -[Jordi] Mmm.
[Harper] Right.
See you in a bit.
-Bye. -[Harper] Bye.
[Jordi] There you go. Three, two, one.
-Okay! -Will you eat some more?
-[Harper] Okay. -[Jordi] It's looking good.
Pour some more in. Come on.
-[Harper] How about this? -[Jordi] That's perfect.
-[Harper] Can I flip it again? -[Jordi] Of course.
[Erin] Antonio, hi.
How are you feeling?
I'm sorry Harper hit you.
But what you said wasn't very nice.
translation.de: Aber was du gesagt hast, war nicht nett.

translation.en: I was hoping I could speak to your parents.
Dad's on a business trip.
translation.de: Dad ist auf Geschäftsreise. Mum hat Tennisstunde.

translation.en: Mum's got a tennis lesson. She's round the back.
translation.de: Dad ist auf Geschäftsreise. Mum hat Tennisstunde. Sie ist hinten. Heute ist ihr Geburtstag.

translation.en: It's her birthday today.
translation.de: Sie ist hinten. Heute ist ihr Geburtstag.

translation.en: I know. We're coming to her party tonight. It's going to be fun!
translation.de: Ich weiß. Wir kommen zu ihrer Party. Das wird lustig!

translation.en: -Have you got it fixed yet? -[Jordi] Yeah.
Watch this.
Huh? No. Okay, no, no. No, no.
That is… a work in progress.
Why don't you take the day off?
Oh, I can't. Not with this job review coming up. I need to show my face.
translation.de: Ich habe bald das Bewerbungsgespräch. Ich muss mich zeigen.

translation.en: Well, can you promise, at least, to not get involved in any armed robberies?
translation.de: Versprichst du, nicht in Raubüberfällen zu geraten?

translation.en: I want to say yes… Ears.
Harp, we're going to be late. Move it!
Morning, Emilio.
[in Spanish] Good morning.
[in English] Wow. Almost made it into your house.
translation.de: Wow. Du hast es fast nach Hause geschafft.

translation.en: Almost. Yeah.
I was going to call around last night.
-I heard what happened at the supermarket. -Oh, we're fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.de: -Habe gehört, was passiert ist. -Uns geht's gut. Keine Sorge.

translation.en: We'll need to interview you today or tomorrow.
translation.de: Wir müssen dich heute oder morgen befragen.

translation.en: I'll be on the investigating team, so don't worry about it.
translation.de: Ich bin im Ermittlungsteam, also keine Sorge.

translation.en: There's not much to say, but okay, sure.
translation.de: Es gibt nicht viel zu sagen, aber ok.

translation.en: -Hey, if you want coffee, Jordi made some. -Okay. Thank you.
translation.de: -Jordi hat Kaffee, wenn du einen magst. -Ok. Danke.

translation.en: -See you. -[Emilio] Bye.
Glasses on, Harp.
Why does he sleep in his car?
You know how Emilio's wife doesn't live there anymore?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass seine Frau weg ist?

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, he misses her a lot, so he'd rather sleep in the car than an empty bed.
translation.de: Er vermisst sie so sehr, er schläft lieber im Auto als im leeren Bett.

translation.en: That's sad.
It is, yeah.
[Emilio in Spanish] Hey, buddy, give me a coffee.
translation.de: Hey, Kumpel, ich brauche einen Kaffee.

translation.en: [Erin in English] You don't have to be here if you're not ready yet.
translation.de: Du musst nicht in die Schule. Ich bringe dich auch nach Hause.

translation.en: -I can take you home. -[Harper] I'm fine.
translation.de: Du musst nicht in die Schule. Ich bringe dich auch nach Hause. Mir geht es gut.

translation.en: Oh, uh, see you later, Mum.
[Erin] Bye.
[man] You're a hero, Erin.
We are so glad you are okay.
translation.de: Wir sind froh, dass es dir gut geht.

translation.en: Is Harper okay? We were so worried.
translation.de: Ist Harper ok? Wir waren so besorgt.

translation.en: [Erin] She's fine. Thank you.
So… there's bad news and good news.
translation.de: Also… Es gibt schlechte und gute Nachrichten.

translation.en: Okay.
So the bad news is Penelope Reyna's lodged a formal complaint
translation.de: Die schlechte ist, Penelope Reyna hat eine Beschwerde eingereicht.

translation.en: to have Harper removed from the school.
You're fucking kidding me.
She's very upset about what happened to her son.
translation.de: Sie ärgert sich über die Sache mit ihrem Sohn.

translation.en: She claims Harper is a psychopath.
Olivia, you do know Antonio was making fun of her eye problem.
translation.de: Er machte sich über ihr Augenproblem lustig.

translation.en: Or was it a sociopath?
Psychopath? Sociopath?
Anyway, people tell me there's a difference, but tomato, tomato.
translation.de: Manche sagen, es gäbe einen Unterschied. Wie auch immer.

translation.en: I mean, will she succeed or what do I do?
translation.de: Wird sie Erfolg haben? Was soll ich tun?

translation.en: It's Penelope, so…
What's the good news?
The good news. The good news is, well, you got attacked in a supermarket.
translation.de: Die gute Nachricht ist, du wurdest im Supermarkt angegriffen.

translation.en: How is that good news, Olivia?
Big picture.
Before you were some faceless drone, a totally forgettable substitute teacher,
translation.de: Vorher warst du ein Niemand, eine übersehbare Aushilfslehrerin.

translation.en: but now you are a hero who stopped a robbery
translation.de: Jetzt bist du eine Heldin, die einen Überfall beendet hat

translation.en: and definitely deserves that full-time contract.
Plus, you've got your photo in the paper.
translation.de: und einen Vollzeitvertrag verdient. Plus, dein Foto ist in der Zeitung.

translation.en: Don't worry. You look great. It's a lovely photo.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Du siehst toll aus. Ein schönes Foto.

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Yeah, okay. I need to go.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Du siehst toll aus. Ein schönes Foto. Ok. Ich muss los.

translation.en: -Okay. -[Erin] Yeah.
Okay.
-Hello. -[students] Hello.
I'm Mrs. Carter. I'll be filling in for Mr. Luis today.
translation.de: Ich bin Mrs. Carter und vertrete heute Mr. Luis.

translation.en: Good aim, Dylan.
[Dylan] It was an accident, Miss. Don't shoot me.
translation.de: Das war ein Versehen. Erschießen Sie mich nicht.

translation.en: [Erin] Okay, so, uh, page 29.
-Hey. -Hello.
-What are you doing here? -[Emilio] I was worried.
How are your classes going?
Okay.
Look, your interview is scheduled for two o'clock tomorrow.
translation.de: Dein Interview ist morgen um 14:00 Uhr.

translation.en: Sant Àngel station. You're speaking to Inspector Tabarez.
translation.de: Polizeistation Sant Àngel. Mit Inspektor Tabarez.

translation.en: Yeah, okay. But did you need to come all the way here to tell me that?
translation.de: Bist du extra hergekommen, um mir das zu sagen?

translation.en: No, but I want to give you my take on the situation.
translation.de: Nein. Ich wollte dir meine Einschätzung geben.

translation.en: These people were professionals.
They knew Thursday was the payroll.
They came at the end of the day, disabled security cameras except…
translation.de: Sie kamen am Ende des Tages, deaktivierten die Überwachungskameras.

translation.en: they missed one.
An older model on a different circuit.
translation.de: Ein älteres Modell mit eigenem Schaltkreis.

translation.en: -Yeah… -You handled yourself pretty well.
Yeah, well, you hear about these things, don't you?
translation.de: Man hört von diesen Dingen, oder?

translation.en: A woman's child is being trapped under a car,
translation.de: Ein Kind gerät unter ein Auto.

translation.en: and she finds the strength to
lift it up.
Or to stab someone in the legs twice with a cake tester
translation.de: Oder man sticht jemandem zweimal mit einem Kuchentester in die Beine?

translation.en: and then shoot them?
I didn't shoot anyone. The gun just went off.
translation.de: Ich schoss auf niemanden. Die Waffe ging los.

translation.en: -Okay. -Look. Am I in trouble here?
No, no, of course not. I mean…
No, I know you.
But my boss is a bloodhound,
translation.de: Aber mein Boss ist ein Bluthund.

translation.en: and he'll be all over this footage, and maybe to him, this will look a little different,
translation.de: Er wird sich das genau ansehen. Vielleicht sieht er die Dinge anders.

translation.en: so if there's anything you need to tell me, now would be--
translation.de: Wenn du mir also etwas sagen möchtest, wäre jetzt…

translation.en: Only that you're being a bit of a dick right now, okay?
translation.de: Nur, dass du gerade ein Arsch bist.

translation.en: Okay.
[sighs] Just be careful. There were two of them at the supermarket.
translation.de: Sei vorsichtig. Es waren zwei im Supermarkt.

translation.en: One's dead but the other one… the other one is still out there.
translation.de: Einer ist tot, aber der anderer läuft frei herum.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
Thanks, Emilio.
I feel great now.
-I'll see you at the party. -Yeah, okay. See you later.
translation.de: -Wir sehen uns auf der Party. -Bis später.

translation.en: But look after yourself.
I am.
Hey, Harp. Harp.
Go and find Antonio and say hello to him.
Do I have to?
Well, yeah.
Go. Go.
Yeah.
-Everybody's talking about you. -Yeah.
Penelope's going to love that, someone else being the center of attention.
translation.de: Penelope wird das lieben. Jemand anderes, der im Mittelpunkt steht.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe I should, I don't know, wish her a happy birthday.
translation.de: Vielleicht sollte ich ihr zum Geburtstag gratulieren.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
-Yeah. -And we will go find the bar.
Yeah, that's an even better idea.
You okay?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I'm good.
My mum says I've got to apologize to you.
translation.de: Meine Mum sagt, ich soll mich bei dir entschuldigen.

translation.en: So shake my hand.
If you don't shake my hand, I'm going to stab your eyes out.
translation.de: Wenn nicht, steche ich dir die Augen aus.

translation.en: Mmm, thank you, Antonio. You look very smart.
translation.de: Danke, Antonio. Du siehst sehr schlau aus.

translation.en: I'm gonna go get some ice cream now.
translation.de: Ich hole mir jetzt ein Eis.

translation.en: Hi.
Harper's very sorry about what happened and I'm sorry too.
translation.de: Harper tut leid, was passiert ist. Und mir auch.

translation.en: Thank you, Erin. That means a lot. [Erin] Yeah, she's been…
She's had a tough week.
Okay, she's… It's been a lot.
I know, and it breaks my heart.
translation.de: Ich weiß, und es bricht mir das Herz.

translation.en: But the other children need to be protected from her.
translation.de: Aber die anderen Kinder müssen vor ihr beschützt werden.

translation.en: Oh, fuck off, Penelope.
Seriously? She's… she's not a danger to anyone.
translation.de: Im Ernst? Sie ist für niemanden gefährlich.

translation.en: She doesn't have to be kicked out of school. I can see where she gets her temper from.
translation.de: -Sie muss nicht verwiesen werden. -Sie kommt wohl nach Ihnen.

translation.en: Okay, I apologize.
But I was hoping we could sort this ourselves, as neighbors.
translation.de: Ich hoffte, wir könnten das als Nachbarn regeln.

translation.en: We're not neighbors.
We just live near each other.
translation.de: Wir wohnen nur in der Nähe.

translation.en: You think you're better than everyone else? Me?
translation.de: -Sie halten sich wohl für etwas Besseres? -Ich?

translation.en: You have a giant, naked ice sculpture of yourself. Come on.
translation.de: Da steht eine riesige, nackte Eisskulptur von Ihnen.

translation.en: That was a gift of love from my husband.
I will try my best to be a better neighbor,
translation.de: Ich werde eine bessere Nachbarin sein,

translation.en: if that's what you want, but please don't…
translation.de: wenn Sie das wollen, aber bitte…

translation.en: don't get Harper expelled. She needs this.
translation.de: Lassen Sie Harper nicht von der Schule werfen.

translation.en: We'll see, Erin.
Now move along. You're spoiling the view.
translation.de: Gehen Sie jetzt. Sie verderben die Aussicht.

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
[Jordi] Uh-huh. Yeah.
Yeah, come on.
We weren't arguing. I was just asking her the name of her ice sculptor.
translation.de: Es gab keinen Streit. Ich wollte den Namen des Eiskünstlers wissen.

translation.en: You never know when you're going to need one.
It was quite impressive, I have to admit.
Do you think she has a special guy for that?
Well, she didn't want to tell me.
What?
I turned the lights off before we left.
[Jordi] Harp, wait here.
Or maybe you just forgot?
Good afternoon, Mrs. Carter. I'm Inspector Tabarez. Let's get started.
translation.de: Guten Tag, Mrs. Carter. Ich bin Inspektor Tabarez. Fangen wir an.

translation.en: In Strasbourg, you were a private tutor to an American family.
translation.de: In Straßburg waren Sie Privatlehrerin bei einer amerikanischen Familie.

translation.en: Yes, the Palmers. They had two children, Lisa and Mark.
translation.de: Ja, die Palmers. Sie hatten zwei Kinder, Lisa und Mark.

translation.en: And when you started as a substitute at St. Joseph's International,
translation.de: Als Sie als Vertretungslehrerin bei St. Joseph's International anfingen,

translation.en: this Palmer family were provided as reference.
Yes, I think so. Yes.
[Tabarez] The phone number that you gave for them is no longer in use.
translation.de: Die Telefonnummer, die Sie angaben, ist nicht mehr aktiv.

translation.en: People change phones.
No, there is no trace of any such family in Strasbourg at that time.
translation.de: Nein. Von dieser Familie fehlt in Straßburg zu der Zeit jegliche Spur.

translation.en: I… I don't know what to tell you. They were there and…
translation.de: Was soll ich sagen? Sie waren da und…

translation.en: [Tabarez] Your husband, Jordi Collantes, is a nurse at Hospital General?
translation.de: Ihr Mann, Jordi Collantes, ist Pfleger im Hospital General.

translation.en: He took you to the ICU to see the injured man from the supermarket?
translation.de: Er brachte Sie auf die Intensivstation zu dem Verletzten aus dem Supermarkt?

translation.en: [Erin] Yes, I felt bad about what happened.
You felt bad about the person who tried to kill you?
translation.de: Gegenüber der Person, die Sie umbringen wollte?

translation.en: I felt bad about what happened. Yes.
[Tabarez] And was your husband with you when this man suffered his heart attack?
translation.de: War Ihr Mann bei Ihnen, als der Mann einen Herzinfarkt erlitt?

translation.en: No, I asked him to go check on our daughter, Harper.
translation.de: Nein, ich bat ihn, nach unserer Tochter zu sehen.

translation.en: Oh, so you were alone with the deceased?
translation.de: Sie waren mit dem Verstorbenen alleine?

translation.en: [Erin] Well, Jordi was only gone for a minute
and there was a policeman outside the room the whole time.
translation.de: Und ein Polizist war die ganze Zeit vor dem Zimmer.

translation.en: Did you know that asphyxiation can bring on a cardiac arrest?
translation.de: Wussten Sie, dass Ersticken zum Herzstillstand führen kann?

translation.en: No, I did not.
[Tabarez] So maybe this man died due to complications from his gunshot wound,
translation.de: Vielleicht starb dieser Mann an Komplikationen seiner Schusswunde,

translation.en: or maybe someone took a pillow and with their hands…
translation.de: oder jemand nahm ein Kissen in die Hand…

translation.en: Hold on. I've done nothing wrong.
[Tabarez] That is not for you to decide.
Listen. I don't give a fuck what you think the CCTV footage shows you, okay?
translation.de: Scheißegal, was Sie von den Überwachungsvideos halten.

translation.en: Does it show my daughter, terrified?
Hiding from the man with the fucking gun?
translation.de: Die sich vor dem bewaffneten Mann versteckt?

translation.en: [Tabarez] No.
There is no footage from the supermarket.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Aufnahmen aus dem Supermarkt.

translation.en: All the cameras had been turned off.
I'm sorry. That must make your job a lot harder.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Das muss Ihre Arbeit erschweren.

translation.en: And also, sorry for all the swearing.
[in Spanish] Okay. I'll call you in a second. Sorry.
translation.de: Ich rufe gleich zurück. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: [Erin in English] Harper, let's go.
How did it go?
Apparently there was no supermarket footage.
Weird.
Maybe there was a problem with that other camera after all.
translation.de: Dann hatte die andere Kamera doch ein Problem.

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
translation.de: Was hast du dir dabei gedacht?

translation.en: Erin, stop, please.
I thought I was helping you.
And what if someone finds out, huh?
Do you know what that makes me look like? Like I've got something to hide.
translation.de: Wie lässt mich das aussehen? Als hätte ich etwas zu verbergen.

translation.en: [Emilio] I thought it'd be easier this way.
translation.de: Ich dachte, so wäre es einfacher.

translation.en: [Erin] Well, it isn't. Is it?
Emilio, I didn't ask for your help. I didn't ask you to steal camera footage.
translation.de: Ich wollte weder deine Hilfe noch, dass du die Aufnahmen stiehlst.

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this.
[Harper] Mum, what is it?
Sorry, I'm okay. It's just…
translation.de: Tut mir leid, alles gut, es ist nur…

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder if we made a mistake in coming here.
translation.de: Ich frage mich manchmal, ob es falsch war hierherzukommen.

translation.en: Harp, slow down.
-You left your glasses in the car. -[Harper] I don't care.
The sun is bad for your eyes.
Good. I want to go blind. I'm bored of waiting.
translation.de: Gut. Dann erblinde ich endlich. Das Warten langweilt mich.

translation.en: Put your glasses on.
-Harp! -[Harper] You're hurting me!
I'm not hurting you. I'm trying to protect you.
translation.de: Tue ich nicht, ich will dich beschützen.

translation.en: Leave me alone!
I don't want to go. I like it here.
translation.de: Ich will nicht weg. Ich mag es hier.

translation.en: Do you remember when we first moved here?
translation.de: Weißt du noch, als wir hierhergezogen sind?

translation.en: And I couldn't keep you out of the water.
You wanted to go to the beach every day.
translation.de: Wolltest jeden Tag an den Strand.

translation.en: You'd wake us up at 6:00 a.m. with your costume on.
translation.de: Standest früh um 6:00 Uhr im Badeanzug vor unserem Bett.

translation.en: And I had to stop because the sun hurts my eyes.
translation.de: Bis es nicht mehr ging. Die Sonne griff meine Augen an.

translation.en: Well, that's why you need to wear your special glasses.
translation.de: Deshalb musst du deine Brille tragen.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on, Harp!
[Harper] Hey, Mum…
Harp, you can go inside the house. I'm just…
I'm just going to have a quick chat with Penelope.
She hates me, doesn't she?
What? No.
Of course not. No, she doesn't.
I was just starting to enjoy school.
translation.de: Die Schule fing gerade an, Spaß zu machen.

translation.en: Please don't let her kick me out.
Please, Mum.
Listen, she's not going to, okay?
translation.de: Hör zu, das wird sie nicht, ok?

translation.en: Don't worry.
Come here.
Now go inside.
I'll see you there.
Have you dropped your complaint against Harper yet?
No. Of course not.
I'm going to ask you politely one last time.
translation.de: Ich bitte Sie ein letztes Mal.

translation.en: Please.
No means no, Erin.
I filmed you
having sex with your tennis coach.
Have you lost your mind?
Spying on people.
-Filming them. -You came after my family.
Your daughter broke my son's teeth. [Erin] I'm not saying this is my finest hour, okay?
translation.de: -Harper schlug Antonio Zähne aus. -Ich bin nicht stolz darauf.

translation.en: But if you don't back down,
I have no choice. I'll send the video to your husband.
translation.de: schicke ich Ihrem Mann das Video.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You see, Erin,
he phoned the morning of my birthday,
translation.de: er rief an meinem Geburtstag an

translation.en: said he wasn't able to make it home.
translation.de: und sagte, er könne nicht kommen.

translation.en: Some important meeting.
When I told him I was upset, he said,
translation.de: Als ich sagte, ich sei sauer, sagte er,

translation.en: he'd paid for the fucking party, what more did I want?
translation.de: er hätte für die Party bezahlt, was ich noch wolle?

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that, um…
And I'm not judging you. I'm just…
I'm protecting my daughter.
I see no reason why we can't sort this out between us.
translation.de: Wir sollten das unter uns klären können.

translation.en: As neighbors.
Thank you, Penelope.
[Penelope] Don't thank me.
What you've done here, Erin, it was a mistake.
translation.de: Was Sie getan haben, Erin, war ein Fehler.

translation.en: A big mistake.
[Jordi] Dinner is served. How hungry are you?
translation.de: Es gibt Abendessen. Wie hungrig bist du?

translation.en: [Harper] Kind of hungry.
[Jodi] Okay, I will give you a kind-of-hungry portion. Hey.
Here we go. We need to eat fast
if we're going to make it to Harper's musical on time.
translation.de: wenn wir es zum Musical schaffen wollen.

translation.en: Harper is, uh… she's, um…
she's not in the musical.
What?
What happened?
They just had too many people or something.
translation.de: Es waren schon zu viele oder so.

translation.en: It's one of those things.
I broke two of Antonio's teeth. Now Mrs. Reyna's trying to expel me.
translation.de: Ich schlug Antonio zwei Zähne aus. Mrs. Reyna will mich hinauswerfen lassen.

translation.en: [Jordi] Wait. What? Seriously?
Okay, relax. Okay?
Relax?
I'm sorry. I should've said something. Yeah.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich nichts sagte.

translation.en: Can we talk about this later? I really need to get changed.
translation.de: Können wir später darüber reden? Ich muss mich umziehen.

translation.en: [Jordi] Harp, you can eat in front of the TV.
translation.de: Harp, du darfst vor dem Fernseher essen.

translation.en: Um, so, you know, Penelope trying to get our daughter kicked out of school,
translation.de: Dass Penelope unsere Tochter von der Schule werfen lassen will,

translation.en: it's kind of a big deal.
I've sorted it out.
How?
It doesn't matter.
[Jordi] All of it matters.
The supermarket, the police, everything.
translation.de: Der Supermarkt, die Polizei, alles zählt.

translation.en: You could have died the other night.
But you're acting like it was normal.
translation.de: Aber du tust so, als wäre das normal.

translation.en: Look at me.
I'm wearing a tie.
I fucking hate ties.
I think it looks nice.
[Jordi] When did you start keeping things from me and shutting me out?
translation.de: Seit wann hast du Geheimnisse vor mir und schließt mich aus?

translation.en: [Olivia] Enjoy the show. It's just through this way.
Enjoy the show.
-Right. -Welcome.
It's through this way.
Hi!
Enjoy the show.
-Nice to see you. -You too.
-Welcome. -Thank you.
Hello.
[Olivia] Enjoy the show.
Thank you very much.
So, what's tonight's excuse?
Traffic? Flood?
I had a fight with Jordi.
I just…
I just don't know how you do it.
You have twice as many kids and responsibilities,
translation.de: Du hast doppelt so viele Kinder und Verantwortung,

translation.en: but you're always on time, always on form.
translation.de: aber bist immer pünktlich und vorbereitet.

translation.en: I'm so high right now, this is basically an out-of-body experience.
translation.de: Ich bin total high. Für mich ist das eine außerkörperliche Erfahrung.

translation.en: -Whoa. -I know.
You'll be okay.
You're right where you're meant to be.
translation.de: Du bist da, wo du sein sollst.

translation.en: -Yeah. You're high. -[applause]
Yeah.
Fuck's sake, we're missing it. Come on. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
translation.de: Verdammt, wir verpassen es. Komm schon. Los.

translation.en: ♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky ♪
♪ The stars hanging over your head ♪
♪ The sun burning brightly in red ♪
translation.de: Die Sonne glüht hell in Rot

translation.en: ♪ It all started with a bang ♪
♪ It started with a bang ♪
-♪ It started with a bang… ♪ -Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.de: Es begann mit einem Knall Bin gleich zurück.

translation.en: [students] ♪ All that surrounds you ♪
♪ Every light in the sky… ♪
Excuse me.
Can I help you?
If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.de: Die Toilette ist drüben bei der Eingangshalle.

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
translation.de: Gehen Sie, bevor ich den Sicherheitsdienst rufe.

translation.en: You know, I almost didn't believe it.
When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.de: Als ich dich im Supermarkt sah, dachte ich, das muss eine

translation.en: "Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake."
translation.de: Als ich dich im Supermarkt sah, dachte ich, das muss eine optische Täuschung sein. Ein Fehler.

translation.en: But no.
It really is you.
I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
Jesus Christ, what the--
-[woman] Look at me. -[Erin heaves]
Fucking look at me, Kate!
[chuckles] There she is!
You shouldn't have come here.
Yeah, I wasn't planning on staying, Kate.
translation.de: Ich hatte nicht vor zu bleiben, Kate.

translation.en: -But I know you have it. -No, I don't.
Look at what I've been reduced to.
translation.de: Schau, was aus mir geworden ist.

translation.en: I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.de: Ich raube Supermärkte aus, das ist kurz vor einem Taschendiebstahl.

translation.en: And it's all because of what you did.
Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.de: Gib es mir einfach. Dann bin ich weg. Niemand muss wissen, dass du hier bist.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
But it's you, so I don't.
translation.de: Da du es bist, tue ich das nicht.

translation.en: Okay.
I never liked you anyway.
I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
translation.de: Ich werde der Kleinen nichts tun, aber ich muss sie mitnehmen.

translation.en: Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Sonst glauben sie mir nicht. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: -[bones crunch] -Stay away from her!
[Emilio] What the fuck?
Is she dead?
Jesus Christ.
Who is she?
She's the woman from the supermarket.
You warned me, didn't you?
Okay.
Okay.
Clean up what you can.
We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.de: Wir haben 15 Minuten, um die Leiche hier wegzuschaffen.

translation.en: ♪ We share the same solar system… ♪
-It's faster if you help. -Okay.
♪ We all share the same intergalactic ♪ ♪ Home ♪
translation.de: Wir haben alle dieselbe intergalaktische Sonne

translation.en: That should be deep enough.
Come.
-Do you want to say a few words? -What?
Fuck you for this.
Fuck you.
I meant a prayer or something.
translation.de: Ich meinte ein Gebet oder so.

translation.en: But no, that's good.
I mean… That's good.
Why are you helping me?
'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
translation.de: Weil du die Frau meines besten Freundes bist.

translation.en: We are practically family.
And also, I'm in trouble.
I've got mixed up with some bad people.
So maybe I help you and then you help me.
translation.de: Vielleicht helfe ich dir und du mir.

translation.en: Emilio, I'm a schoolteacher.
Yes, of course you are.
Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.de: Mrs. Carter im Klassenzimmer mit einer Leiche.

translation.en: What if I don't want to help you?
translation.de: Was, wenn ich dir nicht helfen will?

translation.en: [woman] I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
And when I get a bad feeling, I just…
I walk away.
[Harper] I think it might be burnt.
[Jordi] Okay, let me see that.
[Harper] Sorry.
[Jordi] How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.de: Wie wäre es, ich brate und du flippst?

translation.en: [Harper] Sounds good.
[Jordi] There… that one.
-That's it. -[Harper chuckles]
[Harper] Mum.
